title: Macbook: Update Screen not progressing and app keeps crashing

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Ive been trying to play league of legends on my macbook but when this screen pops up it stays there and never progresses. The client also sometimes crashes when i launch it, it takes me like three tries to get the client up . Any one have a solution to this that doesn't involve reinstalling the whole game from scratch?

--------- edit 1 -------------
Currently running the hextech repair tool. Hopefully this can help debug my issue.

replies.body:
Hmmmm it looks like that patcher either hasn't been able to establish a connection with our servers, or the main issue could be that the patcher doesn't have admin rights to scan and update those game files. Let's work through both of these just in case.

Make sure that you look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly, being sure to check port forwarding and DNS settings. Also, go through and double check that your Mac is giving League the admin rights it needs by [**updating your admin settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9).
